channel.title: CVE Feed for KnowageLabs -- Knowage-Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KnowageLabs -- Knowage-Server

item.title: CVE-2022-39295|2024-08-03T12:00:43.794Z -- knowagelabs -- knowage-server
item.description: Knowage is an open source suite for modern business analytics alternative over big data systems. KnowageLabs / Knowage-Server starting with the 6.x branch and prior to versions 7.4.22, 8.0.9, and 8.1.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting because the `XSSRequestWrapper::stripXSS` method can be bypassed. Versions 7.4.22, 8.0.9, and 8.1.0 contain patches for this issue. There are no known workarounds.
